entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kamouraska
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Freezing rain inland late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Freezing rain inland this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
